Text: The Joys of Living 2008–2010:  It compiles tracks recorded during the band's first two years, including their "Shallow Waters" EP (2008), "Common Grounds" single (2009), and "Show of Hands" EP (2010), along with the new tracks "Sweet Harness" and "The Joys of Living".
